overview: Pilot of the series "Hey, Mister, Let's Play". The story of two bears, the older one is experienced and sly, the younger is naive and gullible. This is the story of how they met in the Czech town of Kolín.

production_companies.name: Krátký film Praha – Studio kresleného a loutkového filmu Praha

title: Hey Mister, Let's Play! How They Met At Kolin
